___specification.description: A trustline specification that would produce this trustline in its current state.

___state.description: Properties of the trustline regarding it's current state that are not part of the specification.

___balance.description: The balance on the trustline, representing which party owes the other and by how much.

___counterparty.description: Properties of the trustline from the perspective of the counterparty.

___frozen.description: If true, the trustline is frozen, which means that funds can only be sent to the counterparty.

___limit.description: The maximum amount that the counterparty can be owed through the trustline.

___ripplingDisabled.description: If true, payments cannot ripple through this trustline.

___authorized.description: If true, the counterparty authorizes this party to hold issuances from the counterparty.
